data.comment: The match is underway in Elche.
Elche have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 4, Goal! Fidel gives Elche the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Denis Suarez (Celta Vigo) has received a yellow card from Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 8, Elche have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Celta Vigo throw-in in Elche's half.
In the minute 12, Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elche to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
At Estadio Martínez Valero, Diego Gonzalez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 14, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
At Estadio Martínez Valero, Celta Vigo are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Elche.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
Elche have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 23, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Elche.
Free kick Elche.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Elche in the half of Celta Vigo.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In Elche Elche attack through Lucas Boye. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a Celta Vigo throw-in in Elche's half.
Throw-in for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 40, Juan Sanchez Mino is replacing Fidel for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Santi Mina is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 41, Iago Aspas instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Elche have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 45, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
In Elche, Celta Vigo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Elche.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 47, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Celta Vigo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Hugo Mallo for Celta Vigo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Elche.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 50, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Elche.
Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 54, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Throw-in Elche.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Estadio Martínez Valero.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lucas Boye (Elche) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 59, Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Elche.
Jorge Almiron is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Josema replacing Diego Gonzalez.
In the minute 60, Emiliano Rigoni is replacing Pere Milla for the home team.
Jorge Almiron (Elche) is making a fourth substitution, with Raul Guti replacing Omenuke Mfulu.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
In the minute 64, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Estadio Martínez Valero has been interrupted briefly for a check on Renato Tapia, who is down injured.
In the minute 66, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Renato Tapia, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Fran Beltran is the substitute for Celta Vigo.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Lucas Olaza for Celta Vigo has been booked by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced Santi Mina with Miguel Rodriguez. This is the second substitution made today by Oscar Garcia.
Jorge Almiron (Elche) is making a fifth substitution, with Nino replacing Emiliano Rigoni.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas has been booked in Elche.
Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elche have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Elche's Tete Morente gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Oscar Garcia is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Gabriel Veiga replacing Brais Mendez.
Throw-in for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
In the minute 87, In Elche a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Elche.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Free kick Elche.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Miguel Rodriguez for Celta Vigo has been booked by Ricardo De Burgos Bengoechea and receives a first yellow card.
Antonio Barragan is booked for the home team.
